content: ahnem s fab5flower kay & tess sisters in stitch and myself would all love to see your finished squares please post any pics you take on your ig or fb page if you have one add one or more of the following tags so we can see your lovely work #fab5flowersquare #sipstitchchallenge #crochetroad @crochetroad #sistersinstitch @sistersinstitch #crochetingkay @crochetingkay the square part of this pattern is an original crochet road design and the flower part is an original crocheting kay design and these designs are for personal use only they may not be copied shared translated published altered edited or distributed either online or offline you are free to sell items made from this pattern as long as they are made by yourself in a limited number please mention crocheting kay & crochet road as designers and use your own photos to promote and sell your items thank you and have a wonderful day ©crochet road 2018 all rights reserved sisters in stitch/ crochet road the fab5flower square �9
